img_above_text:
Giant Shigandang
## How to Use the Five Skandhas
img_below_text:
With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(144\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/15/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28144%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts an interaction between the player character and Xu Dog, a key NPC in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The menu options visible include "Show the Five Skandhas," which aligns with the preceding and following text describing the process of delivering the Five Skandhas to Xu Dog. This interaction allows the player to create the Five Skandhas Pill, which boosts health, mana, and stamina. The dialogue at the bottom adds narrative flavor to the encounter.
